name: Piggy Bank Game - Bantumi
description:
Fresh look on a classic game from old Nokia phones

Rules of game:

1. Each player has seven piggy banks. Six small and one large.

2. Touching piggy bank will transfer the coins to all next piggy banks (except for a large opponent's piggy bank), counter-clockwise.

3. The game ends when one of the players has no coins in small piggy banks.

4. The player who will collect more coins in large piggy bank win the game.

5. If a player ends his turn by placing a coin in a large piggy bank then the player has one more turn.

6. If a player ends his turn by placing a coin in an empty piggy bank, the player takes the coin and coins from opponent's piggy bank of the same color and places them in his large piggy bank.


Icons were downloaded from iconfinder, icons8. Sounds were downloaded from freedounds, findsounds and flan4u.
